# maxUDPPayloadSize(_:)

**Instance Method**

Set the maximum length of a QUIC packet that you are willing to receive on a connection, in bytes.

## Declaration

```swift
func maxUDPPayloadSize(_ size: Int) -> QUIC
```

## Parameters

- **size**: The maximum length, in bytes.
